snippet.title: The Chant - Reel 1 – Making Fear
snippet.description:
What if opening your third eye to spirituality you could actually lead to something very dangerous? The Chant is a single-player, third person horror action adventure game set on a remote island spiritual retreat. 

You play the role of Jess, who has joined the Prismic Science Spiritual Retreat to clear the trauma she shares with old friend Kim around the accidental death of her younger sister. 

A peaceful weekend soon turns to dread after a group chant opens The Gloom, a psychedelic dimension of terror that feeds off negative energy. Are you ready to unlock your mind to the unknown?

The Chant - developed by Brass Token and published by Prime Matter will ship on Xbox Series X/S, PS5 and PC on November, 3rd.

#Horrorgames #ActionAdventure #TheChant
 
Keep up to date with the latest news by following us on social: 
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/TheChantGame 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheChantGame 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thechantgame 
Official Website: https://www.thechant.com
